database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS - P aeruginosa PA14 transposon library ethyl acetate/methanol extractions
entry.description:
LC-MS/MS analysis of ethyl acetate/methanol extractions of full P. aeruginosa PA14 transposon library from Ausubel lab at Harvard Medical School (http://ausubellab.mgh.harvard.edu/cgi-bin/pa14/home.cgi)
Under 'Results Files' are two excel sheets. One excel sheet is the library information provided by the Ausubel lab. The second excel sheet is a truncated version including mzXML file name, area under the curve for the internal standard and RAW growth values.
